name: Viking (itch) (FlyingMedic)
description:
This is my first solo project and it's not really easy for me (i'm still a beginner programmer) but it's fun which is the most important part i'm guessing...

anyway, i hope you see something you like or you would like added (i mean there's almost nothing in the game soooo.. but yeah, say something if you want something, right ?)

also.. no clue how to set this page up.. i hope you can download it.
